headline: Finance Executive
summary: Senior financial executive with an extensive background in finance, information systems, planning and the management of commodity based businesses.  Proven ability to enhance profitability through change management, the introduction of efficiencies and the building of value-driven teams.  Diverse experience in Canada, China, Cuba and the Bahamas in nickel, cobalt, coal, precious metals and petroleum commodity industries as well as the industrial civil construction industry.Specialties: Strategic Planning, Information Systems Leadership, International Experience, Operations Experience, Developing Organizations, Wokring with Boards

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description:
The Myshak Group of Companies is a family owned and operated service group. We are supplier of both operated and bare industrial & commercial crane and equipment rentals, along with various transportation & warehousing solutions, and other services to enhance our capabilities.
Our group has over 20 years of work experience in Industrial Oil & Gas (live plant & new construction sites), Industrial Site Maintenance, Commercial Building Construction, Module Fabrication and Windmill Construction, to name a few. Myshak provides the safest and most reliable crane and rigging rentals, storage services and site service equipment rentals, with our locations strategically placed across Canada to better serve our customers.

experiences.title: Chief Financial Officer
experiences.description: Voice Construction is a mid-sized civil industrial construction company that provides construction services primarily to oil sands companies.

experiences.title: VP Finance, CFO
experiences.description: East Energy Corp. is a Canadian junior mining company committed to the development and acquisition of coal properties in China and North America.  East Energy is listed on the TSX Venture Exchange.

experiences.title: VP, Oil & Gas Operations
experiences.description:
Last position was VP. Oil & Gas Operations
Was also VP, Finance & CFO for Luscar Energy Partnership, Chief Financial Officer, Oil & Gas and CFO, Metals Enterprise

experiences.title: CFO, Metals Enterprise
experiences.description: The Metals Enterprise is a nIckel and cobalt mining and refining joint venture between Sherritt International and the Government of Cuba.

experiences.title: VP Finance & CFO
experiences.description: Luscar was the largest coal mining company in Canada with approximately 40 million tonnes of coal produced annually, $1.5B in total assets and revenues of approximately $550M per year. Luscar was owned 50% by Sherritt and 50% by the Ontario Teachers Pension Board.

volunteer_work.title: Chair
volunteer_work.description: Pilgrims Hospice is committed to helping people diagnosed with a life-limiting illness. It is equally important to help ease the challenges that face their loved ones. On a daily basis, we advocate for quality, palliative care on behalf of our clients and their families. Every Canadian facing a life-limiting illness has a right to quality end-of-life care and adequate support for their family.

volunteer_work.title: Governor, Chair, Finance & Audit Committee, Member, HR Committee
